name: Ultimate Notion Workout Tracker
description: Never fail a fitness goal again.The Ultimate Notion Workout Tracker is the ultimate tool for anyone looking to form a consistent workout habit and track their progress. This customizable template allows you to easily log and track your workouts, form a workout habit, and see your progress over time.With this template, you'll have everything you need to stay motivated and on track with your fitness journey.Inside you'll find:Database to log your physical progress (weight, measurements)Exercises &
features: Database to log your physical progress (weight, measurements); Exercises & Muscle Groups Log; Workout Archive to save your workouts; Workout Habit Tracker; Template Button to easily create new weekly workouts
